subtitleNullable: A dataset for detecting potholes using image classification/object detection
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was curated in order to produce an academic project which was Pothole Detection using CNN.


### Content

This dataset is a mix of images of roads from Google and already present pothole dataset on Kaggle. It is distributed into 3 folders - train, val, test. The train folder contains 1167 images, validation folder contains108 images and the test folder contains 136 images. The images have been named Normal and Pothole.
title: Pothole Detection Dataset
